name: Adrenaline Adventure
description: Run against time to reach your goal, pay attention to your surroundings and It avoids the dangers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or higher Processor: 2.1GHz Intel dual-core and above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD5000 with minimum 512MB VRAM and Pixel Shader 3.0 support DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or higher Processor: Core i3-4170 3.7 GHz / A10-7800 3.5-3.9 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 MB available space
